mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sim_customers (id, name, company, cf1, cf2, cf3, cf4, cf5, cf6, address, city, state, postal_code, country, phone, email ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cf1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cf2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cf3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cf4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cf5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cf6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sim_customers set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cf1 = #{cf1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cf2 = #{cf2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cf3 = #{cf3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cf4 = #{cf4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cf5 = #{cf5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cf6 = #{cf6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, company, cf1, cf2, cf3, cf4, cf5, cf6, address, city, state, postal_code, country, phone, email from sim_customers where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, company, cf1, cf2, cf3, cf4, cf5, cf6, address, city, state, postal_code, country, phone, email from sim_customers
